title: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection
description: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection. I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed based on personal taste, but this should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view to access certain actions.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be available in the context menu
SR:
1. Open the editor
2. Select some text
3. Right-click to open the context menu
4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present
5. Switch to the Outline view
6. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is now available via the Edit menu
